break.name: break
break.description: Reduces durability to 0 and marks object as broken

observe.name: observe
observe.description: Updates surroundings by merging new data into the existing dictionary
observe.function: lambda self, data: self.update_state({"surroundings": {**self.state.get("surroundings", {}), **data}}) if isinstance(data, dict) else {'success': False, 'message': 'Data must be a dictionary'}

pick_up.name: pick_up
pick_up.description: Adds an item to the player's inventory

hold.name: hold
hold.description: Marks an item from inventory as being held
hold.function: lambda self, item: self.update_state({"held_item": item}) if 'inventory' in self.state and item in self.state['inventory'] else {'success': False, 'message': 'Item not in inventory'}

release.name: release
release.description: Stops holding an item, optionally removing it from inventory
release.function: lambda self, item, remove_from_inventory=False: self.update_state({"held_item": None, "inventory": [i for i in self.state['inventory'] if i != item] if remove_from_inventory else self.state['inventory']}) if 'held_item' in self.state and self.state['held_item'] == item else {'success': False, 'message': 'Item not held'}

consume_fuel.name: consume_fuel
consume_fuel.description: Reduces fuel level, deactivates object if depleted
consume_fuel.function: lambda self, amount: self.update_state({"fuel": self.state['fuel'] - amount}) if 'fuel' in self.state and self.state['fuel'] > amount else self.update_state({"fuel": 0, "is_active": False}) if 'fuel' in self.state else {'success': False, 'message': 'Fuel not found'}

consume_health.name: consume_health
consume_health.description: Reduces health level, marks player as dead if depleted
consume_health.function: lambda self, amount: self.update_state({"health": self.state['health'] - amount}) if 'health' in self.state and self.state['health'] > amount else self.update_state({"health": 0, "is_alive": False}) if 'health' in self.state else {'success': False, 'message': 'Health not found'}
